definition: generic term for cotton or kapok/cotton/padded or quilted with cotton

quilt/by/(indicates passive-voice clauses)/(literary) to cover/to meet with/(coll.) (since c. 2009) used before a verb that does not accurately represent what actually happened, to describe with black humor how sb or sth was dealt with by the authorities (as in 被自殺|被自杀[bei4 zi4 sha1])

sentences.english: Change good after, lie in the soft pillow and the cotton quilt, feel very comfortable.
sentences.chinese: 換好後，躺在軟綿綿的枕頭與棉被中，覺得很舒服。

sentences.english: This assumes you are sleeping under it, as with a quilt.
sentences.chinese: 這是假設你是下睡覺，因爲與棉被。

sentences.english: And in the night to become cool, to lady finds out the thin quilt.
sentences.chinese: 而且夜晚愈發的涼了，給婆婆找出了薄棉被。

sentences.english: The trees were all covered with white quilts.
sentences.chinese: 樹兒披上了厚厚的棉被。
畫一個有三十個補丁的棉被。

sentences.english: Ever pulled the quilt over your head at home on a cold night?
sentences.chinese: 以往任何時候都帶動棉被在你的頭上在家裏一寒夜呢？

sentences.english: B:No Wonder you brought your quilt and pillow for the camping trip.
sentences.chinese: 難怪你來露營還帶着棉被和枕頭。

sentences.english: Also like the yellow quilt, blanket in the fields, or water.
sentences.chinese: 又象黃色的棉被，鋪蓋在田地裏，或者水面上。

sentences.english: The new bath tissue is the first premium three-layered bath tissue with Plush- Quilts .
sentences.chinese: 新浴組織是第一個高級三個層次浴組織毛絨，棉被。

sentences.english: Quilt Covers, Beachtowels, Bathrobes , Decoration Cushions, Carpets. Towels.
sentences.chinese: 採購產品製成棉被掩護，浴袍，裝飾墊子，地毯。

sentences.english: Comforters, even vacuum-packed ones, take up a lot of room in your carry-on.
sentences.chinese: 即使是真空包裝的棉被也佔據了很大的空間。
是那有襯裏的舒適棉被嗎？

sentences.english: Don't you know, love, can be when quilt?
sentences.chinese: 難道你不知道，愛情，是可以當棉被用的麼？

sentences.english: Blankets, quilts, sweaters… he knits them all.
sentences.chinese: 毯子，棉被，毛衣等等，他都織。

sentences.english: On the wedding night, Lin slept fully dressed and wrapped with a quilt.
sentences.chinese: 新婚之夜，林女士穿着全身的衣服幷包裹着一牀棉被。

sentences.english: The snowflakes are the thick quilts for the wheat.
sentences.chinese: 雪花是冬小麥的厚厚棉被。
